# responses

## <ApiType type="Class" slug="async-context-stream" symbolName="AsyncContextStream" /> AsyncContextStream

An asynchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM with context.

This class supports async iteration to process chunks as they arrive from the model.
Each chunk includes access to the context dependencies.

**Bases:** 
<TypeLink type={{"type_str": "Generic[DepsT]", "description": null, "kind": "generic", "base_type": {"type_str": "Generic", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "Generic", "doc_url": "https://docs.python.org/3/library/typing.html#typing.Generic"}, "parameters": [{"type_str": "DepsT", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "DepsT", "doc_url": null}], "doc_url": null}} />


## <ApiType type="Class" slug="async-context-structured-stream" symbolName="AsyncContextStructuredStream" /> AsyncContextStructuredStream

An asynchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM with context.

This class supports async iteration to process structured outputs as they arrive
from the model. Each chunk includes access to the context dependencies.

**Bases:** 
<TypeLink type={{"type_str": "Generic[DepsT, T]", "description": null, "kind": "generic", "base_type": {"type_str": "Generic", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "Generic", "doc_url": "https://docs.python.org/3/library/typing.html#typing.Generic"}, "parameters": [{"type_str": "DepsT", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "DepsT", "doc_url": null}, {"type_str": "T", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "T", "doc_url": null}], "doc_url": null}} />


## <ApiType type="Class" slug="async-stream" symbolName="AsyncStream" /> AsyncStream

An asynchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

This class supports async iteration to process chunks as they arrive from the model.


## <ApiType type="Class" slug="async-structured-stream" symbolName="AsyncStructuredStream" /> AsyncStructuredStream

An asynchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM.

This class supports async iteration to process structured outputs as they arrive
from the model.

**Bases:** 
<TypeLink type={{"type_str": "Generic[T]", "description": null, "kind": "generic", "base_type": {"type_str": "Generic", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "Generic", "doc_url": "https://docs.python.org/3/library/typing.html#typing.Generic"}, "parameters": [{"type_str": "T", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "T", "doc_url": null}], "doc_url": null}} />

## <ApiType type="Function" slug="mirascope-llm-responses-base_response--base-response-format" symbolName="format" /> format

Format the response according to the response format parser.

This method is only available if the call was created with a T.
It will parse the response content according to the specified format and return
a structured object.

Content types that can be returned in a model response with context.


## <ApiType type="Class" slug="context-stream" symbolName="ContextStream" /> ContextStream

A synchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM with context.

This class supports iteration to process chunks as they arrive from the model.
Each chunk includes access to the context dependencies.

**Bases:** 
<TypeLink type={{"type_str": "Generic[DepsT]", "description": null, "kind": "generic", "base_type": {"type_str": "Generic", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "Generic", "doc_url": "https://docs.python.org/3/library/typing.html#typing.Generic"}, "parameters": [{"type_str": "DepsT", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "DepsT", "doc_url": null}], "doc_url": null}} />


## <ApiType type="Class" slug="context-stream-chunk" symbolName="ContextStreamChunk" /> ContextStreamChunk

A chunk of a streaming response from a contextual LLM call.

Context stream chunks represent incremental pieces of a response that are delivered
as they are generated by the model, allowing for real-time display and processing
with access to the context dependencies.

**Bases:** 
<TypeLink type={{"type_str": "Generic[DepsT, T]", "description": null, "kind": "generic", "base_type": {"type_str": "Generic", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "Generic", "doc_url": "https://docs.python.org/3/library/typing.html#typing.Generic"}, "parameters": [{"type_str": "DepsT", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "DepsT", "doc_url": null}, {"type_str": "T", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "T", "doc_url": null}], "doc_url": null}} />

## <ApiType type="Class" slug="context-structured-stream" symbolName="ContextStructuredStream" /> ContextStructuredStream

A synchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM with context.

This class supports iteration to process structured outputs as they arrive from the
model. Each chunk includes access to the context dependencies.

**Bases:**

## <ApiType type="Attribute" slug="response-content" symbolName="ResponseContent" /> ResponseContent

**Type:** <TypeLink type={{"type_str": "TypeAlias", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "TypeAlias", "doc_url": null}} />

Content types that can be returned in a model response.


## <ApiType type="Class" slug="stream" symbolName="Stream" /> Stream

A synchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

This class supports iteration to process chunks as they arrive from the model.


## <ApiType type="Class" slug="stream-chunk" symbolName="StreamChunk" /> StreamChunk

A chunk of a streaming response from an LLM.

Stream chunks represent incremental pieces of a response that are delivered
as they are generated by the model, allowing for real-time display and processing.

**Bases:** 
<TypeLink type={{"type_str": "Generic[T]", "description": null, "kind": "generic", "base_type": {"type_str": "Generic", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "Generic", "doc_url": "https://docs.python.org/3/library/typing.html#typing.Generic"}, "parameters": [{"type_str": "T", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "T", "doc_url": null}], "doc_url": null}} />

## <ApiType type="Class" slug="structured-stream" symbolName="StructuredStream" /> StructuredStream

A synchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM.

This class supports iteration to process structured outputs as they arrive from the
model.
